item.description: Game Description Hi-Fi RUSH tells the story of the adventures of a guy named Chai. This music lover without one arm decided to take part in the Armstrong project. Vandeley Technologies provides implants to people with physical disabilities, but in return requires them to work for themselves. The hero was supposed to become a scavenger after receiving a mechanical prosthesis. However, during the operation, a music player is accidentally implanted into his chest and gives him new powers.

item.title: EXOME
item.description: Game Description EXOME may be of interest to lovers of playing games with friends. The multiplayer is designed for 2-4 users. For those who like single more, there is an opportunity to play alone. This is a cooperative shooter with a third person with elements of survival and horror. When using optical sights, the camera angle during firing for a short time changes from the eyes. The project is made on the Unreal Engine 5 engine.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: High on Life
item.description: Game Description High On Life is a humorous first -person shooter with metroid elements. It is made in a science fiction setting. Moments with the action alternate with more calm episodes, where you need to chat with hasty characters, fulfill their instructions and solve puzzles. The rich arsenal includes unusual and diverse weapons with two types of shooting - the main and alternative. There are analogues of pistols, shotgun, machine guns and so on.

item.title: Chained Echoes
item.description: Game Description Chained Echoes is a turn-based role-playing game in which you will not only pick up a sword, but also sit in the cockpit of a huge robot! In the world of Valandis, technology and magic go hand in hand. The visual style is made in the spirit of classic JRPGs. A special feature of the setting is that dragons and flying robots are commonplace in the world of Chained Echoes.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere inHELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: In Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nightmare allows gamers to plunge into a dark atmosphere where they have to take control of a boy who has lost his beloved. The protagonist will make his way through dangerous locations where monsters live. The project is a horror adventure game with elements of an action platformer, where you need to overcome various obstacles on the hero’s path, solve puzzles, deal with monsters and look for the right path out of the frightening kingdom of darkness.

Game Description The sandbox 171 stands out against the background of other GTA clones with its entourage. The action takes place in Brazil. The creators offer to ride on the suburbs of San Paulo. Poor areas with narrow streets, graffiti on the walls, dirt and garbage add a special flavor of the local atmosphere. The player controls his character with a third -person view. During shooting on the street, the camera is transferred by the hero’s shoulder.

item.title: Torii
item.description: Game Description In the Torii, gamers have to go to the study of surreal locations, where many strange creatures will be released. The heroine is a girl named Ipa, who has lost her loved one and is now forced to go through the adoption process. Players have to enjoy the introspective adventure, where you need to deal with the fears of the protagonist and search for the missing younger sister. The project is an indie header, where a colorful artistic style is used for the design of the environment.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: A Castle Full of Cats
item.description: Game Description A Castle Full of Cats allows players to go on a colorful journey where they need to squeak objects in a surreal world. The project is a classic visual puzzle where you need to carefully examine locations that are drawn in a cartoony and bright style. You will find many hidden cats that are being held captive. The project combines elements of a metroidvania and a point-and-click quest, where you can look for different ways to solve riddles.

item.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime allows users to go to the study of the galaxy by taking space knights. The game is a role-playing adventure with elements of Rowl, where you have to move along the retro-futuristic universe in order to save the kingdom from the Lords of the abyss that abducted the sun. The protagonist will be a noble traveler, which is the last hope for the salvation of mankind.

item.title: Silver Nornir
item.description: Game Description Silver Nornir invites gamers to plunge into an exciting world where the fate of the entire world is at stake. This is an exciting old school RPG in a fantasy setting. Survivors of two disasters are ready to fight to the end to stop the end of the world. But they need your help! Exciting adventures and exciting battles using magical gems and combo techniques with friends and allies await you.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror filmSIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Faith: The Unholy Trinity
item.description: Game Description Faith: The Unholy Trinity is an indie chorror with an unusual presentation. The project has a minimalistic pixel graphics in retro style. At the same time, there are full-fledged KAT scenes using rotoscopy. The creators also added synthesized computer speech. The plot is dedicated to the confrontation between the minister of the church and the satanic cult, trying to call a powerful demon. The action takes place in the 80s in Connecticut.

item.title: Persona 5 Royal
item.description: Game Description Persona 5 Royal is the official expansion for the fifth part of the Japanese role-playing video game of the same name, which contains even more unique personas, as well as a lot of interesting quests and items. The plot centers on a seemingly ordinary high school student who goes with his family to Tokyo, where he enrolls in a new school. Soon the main character begins to see inexplicable dreams, in which someone tells the guy that a monstrous catastrophe will befall him in the near future.

item.title: The Case of the Golden Idol
item.description: Game Description The Case of the Golden Idol will allow you to become detectives, but not in the modern world - but in the past. The events take place in the 18th century and mostly in an aristocratic society. The plot revolves around the murders of 12 people that occurred over a period of 40 years. During this time, law enforcement agencies were unable to find the suspect, and even moreover, they believe that these crimes are in no way connected with each other.

item.title: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
item.description: Game Description Salt 2: Shores of Gold tells the story of the complex life of a lone pirate who travels on a small sailing ship. Unlike other games on a similar theme, this project does not focus on sea battles or robbing other ships. The player will have to spend the bulk of his time constantly exploring the vast expanses of water and searching for treasures. The main character feels that the ocean is his real home.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: Taiji
item.description: Game Description Taiji combines two genres. This is a mixture of a puzzle game and an adventure game. This indie project has two-dimensional graphics in the style of pixel art. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. There are a huge number of puzzles here. They consist of grids of tiles, and are built around the need to turn these squares on or off. The main feature of the title is that absolutely all puzzles use a single interface.

item.title: Brok The Investigator
item.description: Game Description Brok The Investigator is an adventure role -playing game that combines the elements of the action, quest and detective. In the center of history, anthropomorphic creatures. You play for a crocodile-drinker named Brock, investigating a mysterious case. During the game, you have to use not only the bright mind, but also the fists. Choose a detective that has to play. You can be a good cop, trying to resolve conflicts with the help of a good word, or you can knock out information through rough power.

item.title: Kalinur
item.description: Game Description Kalinur sends a player on a trip to a huge castle to confront a wizard who plunged the kingdom into suffering. It is necessary to explore the nonlinear card in order to find the sorcerer and put an end to its influence. The main task is to return the world by overcoming the source of disasters. The adventure is built on overcoming serious trials, bringing awards and contributing to advance to the final battle with a powerful magician.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horrorEscape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered
item.description: Game Description Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered is an open-world action-adventure game set in New York City. Supervillains break free in the form of characters such as Mister Negative, Rhino, Scorpio, Vulture and Electro. But before he can track them down, Peter Parker contacts William Fisk. After he arrests a businessman, a gang war breaks out. Now only Spider-Man can stop the crime raging in the city. Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered includes an extensive expansion for The City That Never Sleeps.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description InCult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Stray
item.description: Game Description Stray takes the player to the distant future, the world of cyberpunk. The story follows the adventures of a lost cat looking for his way home. A stray animal found itself in the fortified city of Kowloon, from which it is not easy to find a way out. People have not lived here for a long time, and the streets are filled with robots. Find out the secrets of a long-abandoned settlement.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Kao The Kangaroo
item.description: Game Description Kao The Kangaroo is a three-dimensional platformer with a huge amount of action scenes. The game uses cartoon graphics to transmit the beauty of a fictional universe, in which the events of a single -user story campaign take place. Casual management allows players of different ages to quickly remember the keys used and enjoy the versatile mechanic used in the gameplay. The project, developed and published by the TATE Multimedia India, combines elements of constant fights with both small opponents and large, dangerous bosses, and a thoughtful plot with some dramatic turns that make virtual personalities experience.

item.title: Lost Nova
item.description: Game Description Lost Nova is an isometric adventure about a trip to space. A spaceship with the main character crashed. The girl was on an alien planet called Lost Nova. Left alone, the protagonist should explore the surface of the planet, collecting useful objects, creating tools, building a base and much more. All this is necessary in order to find the way home. The heroine is the name of Mia. She decided to spend a vacation outside the Earth, but could not even imagine what kind of disaster it would turn out.

item.title: Buccaneers!
item.description: Game Description Buccaneers adventures! takes gamers to a pirate setting, where they can become a fearless captain and go in search of lost treasures. You will have to face enemy ships, change the course of history and join one of the unique factions in order to seize full power over the Caribbean Sea. There are 4 sides in the game: British, French, Spanish and the formidable Pirate League. Each group will have unique abilities, appearances, and fighting styles during the battle at sea.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: God of War (2022)
item.description: Game Description God of War 2022 is an action-adventure game with a third-person view. This project is both a sequel to the previous part and a restart of the entire universe of the famous, cult slasher about the adventures of Kratos – a Spartan warrior, the protagonist of all 8 games in the “God of War” series, fighting against various gods and mythical creatures in a fit of rage and revenge.

item.title: Mon Bazou
item.description: Game Description While repairing a car inMon Bazou, players have to deal with a variety of everyday problems that affect the life of the main character. The protagonist is a guy who dreams of turning his old car into a racing car that can compete with professional drivers and reach great speed. The game is made in the form of a simulator, where users have to take on the role of a novice racer who will live the everyday routine and do simple things, trying to earn a living.

item.title: One Hand Clapping
item.description: Game Description One Hand Clapping is a musical puzzle game where you need to overcome obstacles with the help of your singing. The structure is a familiar platformer, where the heroine travels through fictional and unusual worlds. Moreover, all puzzles and puzzles are solved directly thanks to the voice. The intensity of singing affects the structure of the world. This game is about how you can find confidence and freedom both in your voice and within yourself.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Battlefield 2042
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 2042 is a tactical action game, the main conflict of which is the confrontation between Russia and the United States in the world of the near future. Humanity has exhausted almost all of the Earth’s resources. Now the mighty superpowers have entered the race for the planet’s last fossils. Germany lost ground and the EU collapsed. The world is in the midst of a Second Great Depression. The gameplay is a first-person shooter.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooterGunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut
item.description: Game Description Kathy Rain: Director’s Cut is an expanded version of the original project, in the center of which Kathy Rain finds herself on a deadly and interesting adventure. The gameplay has undergone many changes, and innovations have also appeared. The story has been expanded, many locations and new puzzles with previously non-existent mechanics and objects for interaction have been added. The event takes place in the 1990s. The game is a rethinking of a standard project released back in 2016.

item.title: Honkai Impact 3RD
item.description: Game Description Honkai Impact 3RD is a role-playing game with Hak-N-Slash elements, in which players manage three heroes called Valkyrie at once. The fighting is realized in real time. You can move freely across the battle of the battle, switching on the go between the characters. Each protagonist has its own unique features and skills. Combining their capabilities, it is necessary to look for effective tactics against enemies. The project is closely related to Genshin Impact.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: The Last Campfire
item.description: Game Description The Last Campfire is a project from the studio that developed No Man’s Sky. It is made in cartoonish, bright graphics, each of the landscapes is unique and creates new details of the world. The story is presented in the genre of an adventure quest. The protagonist will be a coal shining with kindness. He got lost in the forest because a strong current knocked his boat off course and washed ashore.

item.title: Elijah and the out of this world adventure
item.description: Game Description Elijah and the out of this world adventure will show a journey through Cleveland, Ohio, where a regular night turns into an incredible nightmare. The story begins with the fact that Elijah, a simple person working in a local grocery store, is attacked by an alien creature after the end of his shift. Waking up, he sees that his hometown in chaos. The military blocked the territory, and to explain the situation they come up with a bizarre legend about the spill of chemicals.

item.title: Erannorth Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Chronicles combines an RPG and a card game. It’s also a sandbox. There is no complete single plot here. The indie title invites users to entertain themselves: explore the open world, fight monsters, upgrade their character, and participate in random events. You can also go treasure hunting or take tests. This CCG has a high barrier to entry due to the large number of deep mechanics that gamers have to figure out for themselves.

item.title: TOEM
item.description: Game Description TOEM is an adventure puzzle game made in black and white style. Go fancy. expedition, revealing the secrets of the magical world of TOEM. The visual style is made entirely in a hand-drawn monochrome manner. Meet funny characters and help solve their problems. Travel the world and take different photos. Puzzles revolve around exploring the environment and taking pictures. By taking a photo, you can find the answer to your question, thereby helping local animals with pressing problems.

item.title: Scrapnaut
item.description: Game Description Scrapnaut stands out against the background of other sandboxes with elements of survival with its concept. The hero has to fight for life in an open world using the surroundings of steampunk. He periodically fights steam robots and is engaged in the study of the surroundings. On the back, the protagonist wears an oxygen cylinder, so it is important to monitor the level of air. The appearance of the adventurer can be changed due to the change of clothing.

item.title: Residual
item.description: Game Description Residual is a platformer with elements of the survival simulator. The game can boast of the worked out pixel graphics and procedural generation of the world. It is made in a science fiction setting. According to the plot, the hero crashes on one of the planets in the forgotten part of the galaxy. Its task is to study alien technologies and find a way to fix a starship.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story ofWebbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
item.description: Game Description Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - RPG about the fight against demons. Here the player will have to become a legendary warrior, and at the same time understand the true price of good and evil. The story will begin with a fault in the abyss. Crowds of terrible demons escaped from their imprisonment and now they want to enslave this world. The main character and his team of brave fighters with evil will be opposed to them.

item.title: My Garage
item.description: Game Description My Garage is a simulator simulator with a first -person view. In it you can not only repair cars, but also ride them. During travel by transport, you can switch the camera angle. In Indo Tailet, weather conditions are changing. The change of day and night is also available. When driving in the dark, you can turn on the headlights. My Garage has an open world. It consists of mountains, forests, a field, rivers and attractions, like a lighthouse.

item.title: Luna's Fishing Garden
item.description: Game Description Luna’s Fishing Garden is a two -dimensional adventure, the mechanics of which are tied to research, fishing and construction. Traveling through the surrounding waters, you need to catch fish to sell it to the fox. A dream garden is being built with the proceeds. The heroine can plant trees and plants, construct water bodies, as well as populate animals on developing islands. The game process Luna’s Fishing Garden has no restrictions and timers - everything can be done at its pace, enjoying the pacifying gameplay.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Reskue
item.description: Game Description Reskue sends an agent to a silent space station in deep space to investigate the reasons for the loss of communication and salvation of scientific personnel. The main mission is to awaken scientists from cryostasis, emerging from it in a disoriented state and in need of protection. The mysterious hostile force has taken control of the object, turning the station technology against the survivors. The operative must dispose of available equipment and ammunition, moving along dangerous locations divided into cells, and controlling the ship on radioactive fuel.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Days Gone
item.description: Game Description Days gone tells the story of Deikon Saint-Jones. The former member of the Mad Dog Motokoksluba suffers from the loss of the spouse and wanders through an almost destroyed epidemic to the open world. He is inhabited by the remaining groups of peaceful people, looters, crazy cultists, wild animals and freezers. The latter are like zombies. However, these are not revived dead, but live creatures. And these monsters move much faster than any undead.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world ofSubnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Demeo
item.description: Game Description Dark fantasy in Demeo plunges a party of adventurers into dangerous adventures where they have to fight against monsters. The game is made in the form of a role-playing turn-based adventure game, which you can play using virtual reality glasses. The project combines the dungeon crawler genre and tactical strategy, allowing you to take turns on the field and clear locations from opponents. Gamers will extract loot from enemies and strengthen their characters with found artifacts and things.

item.title: Resident Evil Village
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Village continues the adventures of Ethan from the Seven. The Roman numeral hidden in the title on the posters hints that this is not a spin-off, but the eighth part of the series. This is already the tenth project in the main line. Winters was able to escape from the cannibal mansion and save his wife Mia. They got away from the American outback and decided to live an ordinary life.

item.title: Battle Ax
item.description: Game Description Battle Ax-arcade top-downs adventure made in retro-stylistic. Events develop on the lands of Mercia. The civilian population was hostage in the evil sorceress of Etheldred. She captured almost the entire territory of the continent, and she settled in the north of the country. Every 7 years she sends her warriors south to capture even more slaves. Throughout the continent begin to gather brave warriors, eager to join an open battle with the sorceress.

item.title: Reknum Cheri Dreamland
item.description: Game Description Reknum Cheri Dreamland starts an adventure in which Cheri’s heroine awakens from fantasies and falls into a real conflict. Her wanderings in the world of dreams will force to encounter materialized nightmares that threaten the kingdom. Progress depends on the passage of the thematic stages and the deciphering of poetic instructions of the ancestors. The study of the environment prepares for a deeper immersion in the main tests and plot lines of this game, conducting the characters through a series of difficult locations and battles.

item.title: Before Your Eyes
item.description: Game Description Before Your Eye s will take users on an emotional journey from a first-person perspective. The player influences the plot with his own blinks, changing the story and actions. Innovative technology allows you to use a webcam to track the gamer’s blinks and interact with the virtual universe. Along the way you will encounter joyful and heartbreaking memories as your whole life flashes before your eyes. It all begins with the soul setting off on a journey through the afterlife.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: It Takes Two
item.description: Game Description The co-op adventureIt Takes Two follows two central characters: Cody and May. They decided to get a divorce, which is why they found themselves in a surreal environment, turning into dolls. Now they have to go through hundreds of obstacles and dangers while exploring a new environment. A story about the eternal problems of relationships and how the main characters will reunite after overcoming a ton of obstacles on their own path.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: Forza Horizon 4
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 4 is a realistic racing simulator with an open game world, where the player is given the opportunity to explore many cities, participate in various races and interact with other players. Drive along the tracks of Great Britain, unlock new cars, and take part in tournaments and races. The gameplay is focused on interaction between players. To participate in certain races, you will need to find a suitable area, as well as gather all participants in one lobby.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: The Room 4: Old Sins
item.description: Game Description The Room 4: Old Sins is an adventure puzzle game inspired by the works of Lovecraft. The story begins with the disappearance of the chief engineer and his high-ranking wife. After this, the hunt for ancient artifacts begins. A chain of events leads to the attic of their mansion, where there is an old dollhouse… You have to explore a mystical toy mansion that is full of various rooms.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is a survival in the open world where you will build your own base and fight with the mythical creatures of Scandinavian folklore. The events of the game take place in Valheim - the tenth world of the Vikings. The goal of the hero is to get to the gate of Walgalla. Killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit the most diverse corners of the world: thick forests, snowy mountains and much more.

item.title: Binky's Trash Service
item.description: Game Description Binky’s Trash Service lays a waste collection route that runs through a series of villainous shelters. The key task at each level is to find and clean all the garbage containers, and then get to the exit. Performing a mission requires verified movements surrounded by a complete platform obstacles. Success depends on the methodical stripping of locations and accurate control of the actions of the hero. The gameplay in Binky’s Trash Service is built on three buttons responsible for a limited set of movements.

item.title: OMORI
item.description: Game Description Two realities and only one is true in the gameOMORI. A psychological history of surrealism with elements of thriller and horror. The protagonist will have to travel between two dimensions. They are similar, and at the same time radically different. Each reality has its own mysteries and secrets. Explore the new (old) world, make acquaintances with friendly characters who, in another reality, will immediately attack you. Explore the memories of your own path, and finally determine which world is the real reality for you, and which is the other world.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077
item.description: Game Description Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in the futuristic city of Night City, located on the West Coast of the United States. You will play as a protagonist named V (or V). The sex, gender and appearance of the hero must be set independently. Depending on the choice of class, the character’s background differs. There are three of them: Nomad, Child of the Street and Corporate.

item.title: Elephantasy
item.description: Game Description Elephantasy puts the player under the control of a tiny elephant who has fallen into a miniature world. The main goal is to help him return home, and the path to this depends on the achievement of the mysterious tower in the clouds. The local wizard Snorri explains that the collection of gems is the method of ascent to this construction. These artifacts are scattered throughout the environment, and their presence is directly related to the promotion of the character.

item.title: Stirring Abyss
item.description: Game Description Stirring Abyss is a turn-based strategy with role-playing game elements. Uncover the ancient secrets of the undersea depths in a twisted and mystical story inspired by the works of famous writer Howard Phillips Lovecraft. The main character is the captain of the surviving underwater crew of the submarine Salem. The shipwreck occurred during the Cold War. The soldiers survived, but found themselves at the ruins of an extinct civilization.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: The Divine Invasion
item.description: Game Description The Divine Invasion is an adventure action that uses a third -person camera, which allows you to better consider dynamic fights with crowds of enemies and increases the view around the hero. The setting of this project, developed by a small indie studio, becomes a science fiction future with multiple elements of a popular direction-cyberpanus. Thanks to the main task of the gamer, which consists in the extermination of enemies, the game can be considered a simulator of a bond hunter, which serves as mysterious employers for a huge monetary reward.

item.title: Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk
item.description: Game Description Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk is a short visual novel with a deep message and unusual execution, made by the efforts of one developer, one of the indie creators. The visual design of the single-player campaign, which is the only game mode, is made using only two colors - purple and black. For completing a short story, which will take about 15 minutes, the developer has prepared three rewards, implementing a small list of achievements.

item.title: Chronicon
item.description: Game Description Chronicon has a large amount of content, despite its indie-production. There are about 900 skills, abyles and perks and 700 items. The main campaign is divided into 4 acts: a fallen temple, an elven war, Clerburg Castle and dangerous wastelands. Of the classes, the choice is available: Templar, berserker, guard and sorcerer. These are a kind of analogue of the paladin, warrior, archer and magician. Each has various talent branches with active and passive skills.

item.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Horizon Zero Dawn is an action game in the world of a post-apocalyptic future, in which the world is inhabited by robotic dinosaurs that destroyed modern civilization. The few surviving people formed into small primitive tribes and resist mechanical monsters using primitive weapons combined with high technology. The main character of Horizon Zero Dawn is a girl named Aloy. She was raised by a man named Rast, who is an Outcast.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
item.description: Game Description Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends is a dynamic and bloody fighting game, the action of which takes place in an alternative version of our reality, where characters from books, urban legends, cryptozoology, mythology and folklore exist. All heroes of Terrordrome are monsters and villains. The game shows a hypothetical world where all the scary stories heard turned out to be true. There is a story campaign for Alex Van Helsing.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.

item.title: ATRI -My Dear Moments-
item.description: Game Description ATRI -My Dear Moments- is a visual novel with a well-developed plot that leaves food for thought after completing the single-player campaign. Casual control is carried out using the keys on the mouse, allowing you to enjoy reading a work with anime-style slides even for people who are not familiar with games. Recognized masters of this genre worked on the story, which allowed the project to receive many prestigious awards and the love of an audience that loves visual novels.

item.title: Detroit Become Human
item.description: Game Description Detroit: Become Human is a rather interesting game in the interactive cinema genre. It is based on the Quantic Dream graphics core, so the excellent graphics component immediately catches your eye. It is impossible not to note the titanic work of the animators, who created truly gorgeous animations and scenes that were plausible from the point of view of anatomy and physics. The game takes place in the future, in an era of highly developed technology, where androids have already firmly taken their place next to people as loyal and multifunctional humanoid servants.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.description: Game Description Persona 4 Golden is a role-playing game about a group of friends who are able to summon demons from the other world. To do this, it is enough to shoot yourself in the temple. The events take place in the small Japanese town of Inaba. The children in Persona 4 are teenagers going through puberty. The heroes are investigating a mysterious series of murders. The gameplay of Persona 4 Golden contains elements of a visual novel.

item.title: Sea of ​​Thieves
item.description: Game Description Sea of ​​Thieves – seas, ships and a bottle of rum. Immerse yourself in the world of piracy, ship battles, treasure hunting and fun. Create your character, team up with other players, and assemble a team of pirates. A huge open world opens up before you, full of riddles, secrets and adventures. The gameplay of Sea of ​​Thieves is rich in content: The endless ocean and deserted islands - assemble a team of your kind, surf the seas and oceans enjoying the sunset over the waves, sing pirate songs and drink strong rum from barrels in the hold.

item.title: Resident Evil 3 Remake
item.description: Game Description [s][/s]Resident Evil 3: Remake is positioned as a remake of the original Resident Evil 3: Nemesis, released back in 1999. The time gap between the reissue and the original is 20 years. During this time, Capcom managed to radically rethink the series and enrich it with various innovations both in plot and gameplay, since progress does not stand still. If Resident Evil 2 in 2019 offered the player a slower and more intense gameplay, steeped in horror, then the new product in 2020 looks a little different.

item.title: Zompiercer
item.description: Game Description Conceptively Zompiercer is a sandbox with an open detailed world, but the whole thing is played as a first-person shooter about survival during the zombie apocalypse. The planet is covered by a virus. People mutated in bloodthirsty walking corpses. Not many managed to survive, but you are lucky more than the rest. Or not? Survival is just beginning! The game from an independent developer under the nickname DDDIMANN is not a comprehension not by the setting, but by the scale and the implementation of ideas.

item.title: GTA 4
item.description: Game Description GTA 4 became a revolutionary, breakthrough game in the series of criminal action games with a conditionally open world and almost complete freedom of action. It is not only technically and plot-wise different from its predecessors, but also sets a new standard of quality for all representatives of this and other genres. It is worth noting that the concept of GTA has gone far beyond the scope of this franchise, and some mechanics from this series of games are used in projects from other studios.

item.title: Half-Life: Alyx
item.description: Game Description Half-Life: Alyx became the first AAA quality game in history for virtual reality devices, the passage of which can be enjoyed on a PC only with the help of an appropriate device, namely a VR headset from Steam and related gadgets. The plot is a spin-off, the events of which unfold in the interval between the actions of the first and second parts. The Black Mesa Incident allowed Alliance forces to gain a foothold on the planet, leaving the remaining humans trapped in the cities.

item.title: DOOM Eternal
item.description: Game Description DOOM Eternal, a first-person shooter, continues the campaign of DOOM (developed in 2016). Our hero is the Doom Slayer. He will kill mutants and monsters on the territory of Mars, the attached spaceship, its satellites and Earth. In many ways, the plot scenes are taken from the second part of the series. The main addition to the game was moving through the levels. If earlier we could move to the next level only after finishing it, then in the new part it will be possible to “climb” to another location where the events of the next level take place.

item.title: Borderlands 3
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 3 is a continuation of the acclaimed series of shooters, containing tons of loot. The player will take on the role of one of the Vault Hunters and set off to explore the expanses of Pandora. All heroes have their own tree of characteristics, unique abilities and character. The gameplay allows you to go through the adventure solo or enlist the help of friends. The protagonist of Borderlands 3 learned to climb ledges and make tackles.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: The Test
item.description: Game Description The Test is a psychological horror with elements of a visual novel, role-playing adventure, and immersive sim with a lot of text monologues inside the protagonist’s head. The player gets the opportunity to directly influence what is happening using a decision-making system of varying degrees of importance. The isometric camera allows you to get the best view of the two-dimensional space where all the action of the single-player campaign takes place with a well-developed plot about mental suffering.

item.title: Senren＊Banka
item.description: Game Description Senren＊Banka is primarily aimed at anime fans. The project uses the appropriate style (including chibi art) and Japanese voice acting. The plot combines romantic, tragic, mystical and humorous elements. The story revolves around supernatural incidents. A group of young people are trying to hide them from ordinary people. The premise in Senren＊Banka: A Thousand Colors of Love is as follows. A guy named Arichi Masaomi comes to the provincial town of Hoori in the summer.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
item.description: Game Description Red Dead Redemption 2 is a third-person shooter adventure game set in the Wild West in 1899. The action involves the Dutch Van Der Linde gang, which is being pursued by lawmen after a botched ferry robbery. The player will take control of Arthur Morgan, one of the gang members. Some time after the unsuccessful prank, the gang decides that it is time to retire and live the rest of their lives like ordinary people, not bandits.

item.title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
item.description: Game Description Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a complete collection of the cult shooter series about the Master Chief. The collection includes all numbered games in the series that were released before Halo: Infinite. At the same time, the developers have improved the visual component of the game, providing 4k resolution and HDR support for modern monitors. The story tells of the confrontation between the United Nations Space Command and the religious alien alliance Covenant.

item.title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
item.description: Game Description In the epic gameStar Wars Jedi: Fallen Order you will find amazing adventures, new challenges, modern graphics and high-quality laser sword battles! Immerse yourself in this saga of the Jedi and intergalactic war, in which you will play one of the key roles. The story takes place after Episode III, 5 years after the ominous Order 66. You will take on the role of a young Jedi Padawan who barely managed to escape from a trap created by the Sith.

item.title: Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game released in 1999 under the name “The Age of Kings”. The game is famous for the fact that the player develops his civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Age. The gameplay is based on the fact that it is necessary to hire peasants, gather troops, erect buildings, study maps, develop the era and explore new capabilities, technologies and, most importantly, destroy the enemy.

item.title: NFS Heat
item.description: Game Description Need for Speed: Heat is an arcade racing simulator with an open game world and a large selection of cars of a wide variety of brands. The plot takes place in Palm City, a fictional city very similar to sunny Miami. You will be able to ride around the city, along the coast, and also take part in stunning races. The story begins with police captain Mercer catching one of the participants in night racing, which is prohibited by law.

item.title: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut
item.description: Game Description Disco Elysium is an RPG in which a detective must use his skills to conduct a unique investigation. The player will have to interrogate well-developed characters, investigate murders, and, if desired, take bribes. You can become either the savior of the city or the worst disaster for all humanity. Game Features: Unique branched dialogue system. Wide freedom of choice both in the story narrative and in additional tasks. Well-developed characters with their own stories and personalities.

item.title: A Short Hike
item.description: Game Description A Short Hike is an adventure game designed to provide a true sense of exploration and enjoy the vibrant scenery of the mountain town of Hawk Peak. The plot is extremely simple - the main character wants to climb the highest mountain. Starting your journey from a small settlement at the very foot of the mountain, you have to overcome a long and eventful path, full of obstacles and dangers.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: Streets of Rogue
item.description: Game Description A new measures come to a prosperous futuristic city, which introduces a dry law. This caused the rebellion and chaos in Streets of Rogue. The inhabitants of the town created the headquarters of resistance, which is hidden underground. They plan to overthrow a cruel dictator, so we need a hero who will fulfill this task. Having chosen the class of the protagonist, the user will begin his path from the lower floor.

item.title: Pixark
item.description: Game Description Pixark is made in the style of the famous Maycraft, but the game has a good plot, which is revealed in different ways for each player. The world of wildlife includes more than 100 different creatures that we can clone, tame and use for our own purposes. Among them will be friendly inhabitants of the jungle, as well as aggressive representatives of the game world. The mysterious lands made in the form of cubes are destroyed and built every minute.

item.title: Trinoline All Ages Version
item.description: Game Description Trinoline tells the story of a world where humans and androids live together. The main character’s name is Shun Nanami. He lost his sister named Shirone under tragic circumstances and now suffers for years due to the accident. One day he comes home and meets a girl in his home who is exactly like his deceased relative. It soon turns out that her memories and appearance were transferred to the robot.

item.title: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy
item.description: Game Description Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy is a re-release of three parts of lawyer simulators combined with adventure. Here the player will not only defend a person in court, but will also begin to investigate the circumstances of the crime, exploring the place, finding evidence, interrogating witnesses. At the trial, the user will listen to both sides, question, look for contradictions in their words, using found objects. The lawyer will be able to defend himself, even if there is only one piece of evidence proving the innocence of the accused, and will also delay time to collect more information.

item.title: Wushu Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Wushu Chronicles is an adventure role-playing game that invites you to explore the vast expanses of an open eastern world. Events take place during the early Ming Dynasty. The story begins in the 25th year of Hongwu’s reign and continues until the Battle of Jingnan. You have to explore the world of Ming Wushu, which is filled with numerous activities and interesting quests. There are two dozen factions that you are free to join.

item.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
item.description: Game Description Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an incredibly challenging action game that makes feudal Japan look dark, burning, and beautiful at the same time. The third-person stealth action game combines the features of RPGs and the themes of Souls games. Well-designed graphics of feudal Japan allow us to plunge into the difficult process of returning our master of the Ashina clan. The leader of the opposition - Genichiro - kidnapped a samurai from Shinobi, and now we must cope with a huge number of his followers in order to save the teacher, master, master and good friend who paid us well in a past life.

item.title: Truberbrook
item.description: Game Description Trüberbrook takes place in 1967, at a time when the lunar race between the USA and the USSR was in full swing. Student rallies and protests are taking place from Russia to Europe, carrying their slogans in Paris, Berlin, Budapest and Warsaw. The world is full of chaos, but what do we care about the whole world while the German province is dominated by one big problem? Hans Tannhäuser is an American student.

item.title: Devil May Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Devil May Cry 5 is a new third-person slasher for fans of the series. Dante and Nero return to the game universe to defeat all the demons, but will they have a different task? Let’s take a closer look. The developers did not touch the game mechanics; they only significantly changed the speed of the battle. If shooters have a subgenre - FPS - then this slasher is an analogue.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Touhou Luna Nights
item.description: Game Description Touhou Luna Nights is a platformer that immerses you in the atmosphere of gothic mysticism. The main character is Sakuya Izaei, who works as a senior maid for the vampire Remilia Scarlet. The girl was calmly doing housework when the mistress deprived her of her powers and sent her to the “Magical Space.” Sakuya is looking for her way home and is eager to find out what her treacherous boss is up to.

item.title: Metro Exodus: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description The events ofMetro Exodus - a first-person shooter with elements of stealth and horror - take place in the same areas as the previous parts. The Russian Federation and the Republic of Kazakhstan are still waging a fierce war for life inside, in underground territories, with representatives of hostile clans, factions and monsters who devour, rather than kill, their prey. Artyom leaves the Order after the battle for D6.

item.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
item.description: Game Description RESIDENT EVIL 2 / BIOHAZARD RE:2 - a complete rework, allowing players to enjoy modern graphics, a new engine, enemies, weapons and a much more advanced game story. Follow the story of police officer Leon S. Kennedy and student Claire Redfield. Due to an unknown outbreak of a virus, the entire city of Raccoon City was enveloped in monsters, people began to turn into strange creatures, and then kill the survivors.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: DayZ
item.description: Game Description The multiplayer sandboxDayZ is a reworked version of the mod of the same name for Arma 2. The game is distinguished by its extremely realistic setting and hardcore survival in a post-apocalyptic environment. The game takes place in the fictional post-Soviet country of Chernarus. After the outbreak of an unknown virus, most of the population has turned into zombies, and the survivors are forced to fight for their lives and valuable resources.

item.title: GRIS
item.description: Game Description GRIS is a standard platformer, made entirely in bed colors and a constant atmosphere of suffering of the human soul, capturing the reality of pain and the entire oppressive existence. The personification of everything bad lies in the perception of the girl Gris. She is naive, so she suffered a lot in her life. The heroine’s power lies in her dress, which gives her unique abilities. One element of a woman’s wardrobe can replace the protagonist’s entire world in the forge of pain.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Pocket Rogues
item.description: Game Description Pocket Rogues is a role RPG created in the fantasy genre with pixel graphics. The plot tells us about the young young man, who is the seeker of treasures, he found the greatest and mysterious dungeon. Many heroes did not return from here, but we are destined to see a real evil. Ambition, a thirst for wealth and genuine interest simply do not leave a gamer. The gamer has to break through with each subsequent battle through many levels, the generation of which is carried out by an endless random creation.

item.title: Return of the Obra Dinn
item.description: Game Description Return of Obra Dinn is an incredibly challenging game that will take over your head and drive you crazy for days. The quest in the game is made in 1-bit graphics, where reflection and logic are a priority. Despite the fact that the game’s graphics are too primitive, the developer was able to make it varied, depicting many objects, capturing the lives of the heroes and giving us half-valued 50-60 hours of gameplay if we find absolutely everything.

item.title: Assassins Creed Odyssey
item.description: Game Description For the first time in the history of the series, you will be able to choose a character for whom you will administer justice and change history. Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is the first slasher RPG in the history of the developers, in which we do not play as an assassin, but choose a real warrior of Ancient Greece! We are offered two characters to choose from: Alexios or Kassandra.

item.title: Crosscode
item.description: Game Description Crosscode fantasy pitch tells about the young girl Lea, playing in the MMO called Crosscode. That is how, this ambitious project tells about the usual routine rutin classes. According to the plot, events unfold in the near future, where virtual reality has become more interesting than the real one. That is why many people spend days in their favorite toys in search of fun. Lea spends extremely a lot of time here, but there is misfortune.

item.title: Unknown Fate
item.description: Game Description The game consists of constantly searching for objects and solving puzzles. We become a certain entity that helps the main character, Richard, cope with amnesia. He wakes up in a world completely unfamiliar to him, tries to remember at least something, but his attempts end in failure. The main task of the player is to find the appropriate items needed in the task, as well as solve a lot of puzzles.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: Mist Survival
item.description: Game Description Another survival game among zombies is Mist Survival. A completely open world, a unique system of characteristics, new types of weapons, shelters and the ability to create their own gang, attracted new players to fight on an open map against the crowd of enraged people absorbed in the epidemic. The main character, like all real players, will be protected from the epidemic, because in their body there is a special hormone that needs to be nourished every day.

item.title: MONSTER HUNTER: WORLD
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofMONSTER HUNTER: WORLD has been slightly reworked compared to the previous part. We don’t just kill monsters, make new equipment, but now weapons are divided into several classes, and, in fact, at the beginning of the game we are something like a “neutral character”. In the new ecosystem, hunters have emerged who will create incredibly difficult conditions for the existence of monsters. Dragons, flying dinosaurs (not like dragons), and other creatures inhabit this eco-system.

item.title: Dead Cells
item.description: Game Description A stunning rogue-like platformer with metroidvania elements -Dead Cells - features a real fight between the hero and constantly changing levels on the territory of the castle. Our hero is a creature who is trying to get out of the castle’s maze. He will try over and over again to cope with constantly generated opponents. But in random places on the map you will find many weapons with random characteristics.

item.title: Yakuza 0
item.description: Game Description As a dialogue-heavy role-playing game that explores a deep story,Yakuza 0 claims to be a game that combines friendship, self-love, and the search for true calling. The Yakuza is the largest mafia group in Japan, which controls everything that can be controlled. Events begin in 1988, when two Yakuza characters - Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima - take part in a battle for a small industrial plot in the center of Kamurocho.

item.title: GNOG
item.description: Game Description The GNOG puzzle includes dozens of three -dimensional puzzles based on tactile interaction and a solution by detecting different moving parts. In the course of passing on the screen, the bizarre heads of the monster are displayed. Each creature hides the mysterious dimension required for the study. The player’s main task is to pull and touch every detail of the object that appears on the screen. Many elements from an unusual figure are interactive and help to come closer to unraveling.

item.title: DARK SOULS: REMASTERED
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS: REMASTERED is an already iconic Japanese action/RPG released in 2011. The development was carried out by From Software. A remastered version was released in May 2018 at the instigation of QLOC. So, what are the acclaimed “Dark Souls”? Firstly, this is a high-quality action RPG, with a third-person view. At the very beginning, you will need to set a number of characteristics for your character: appearance and class.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Mirror
item.description: Game Description Mirror is a visual novel that perfectly combines erotic content, an RPG component, an interactive plot and battles in which you take a direct part. The whole game is built on the “three in a row” principle. In the casual combination of characters, you will only take part in the battle on the Match 3 battlefield. That is, you will win if you can score more points. The game features three heroines who will oppose you throughout the game.

item.title: Tower of Time
item.description: Game Description At sunset, artara gradually open up new horizons of another world. Thousands of pages of books, manuscripts and video stations tell us the plot of Tower of Time through the prism of distant views on the plot from the game character. The new system in the RPG game is revealed from the first minutes of gameplay. We create a unique character who does not know what is happening in his world.

item.title: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition is a fantasy role-playing game, an improved version of the original part. The player will move into a surreal world in which there has been a war for a long time between the forces of Light and Darkness. Take control of a dwarven paladin, half-elven thief, gnome sorcerer, or other race. Each class has a unique branch of abilities, its own weapons and storyline.

item.title: Far Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Finally, the plot ofFar Cry 5 has reached America. Crazed fanatics unleashed their might on the state of Montana. A first-person shooter with action elements brings us to a reality in which even the movements of dogs will be more than real. The modernization of the shooter took several years, so the development studio warns us in advance that the game is based on religious motives. Age limit: 18+.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot ofKingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
